Lecture 0: Introduction to Python for Quantitative Research

Written on September 14th, 2019 by partha

These are topics to introduce Jupyter Notebook and Python for quantitative research. This is just to give a head start in using these tools for quantitative research.

Study Material

  • Introduction to Data Analysis using Python
  • Basics of Python Ipython Notebook
  • Basic Data Analysis using Python Ipython Notebook

Homework exercises from Textbook

  • Lab0 - Ipython Notebook introducing Python
  • School data to be used for homework

Additional Resources

  • Foundations of Data Science - Computational Thinking with Python, UC Berkeley
  • The Foundation of Data Science by Ani Adhikari and John DeNero(please refer to python related chapters specifically)
